description:
Dan`s father runs a spa resort hotel in the Isshu region located in between Kanoko Town and Sanyo City. A group of Meguroko were scaring off their customers at the sand bath and he had to close it down.
With the help of Satoshi and Iris, Dan and his father were able to figure out that the Meguroko were scaring off the customers to protect them from being scalded when the geysers went off. After the waters cooled a bit, Dan and his father opened up a hot spring just outside their hotel.
name: Dan no Chichioya
